Events.desc: Annual Blue Conference between leaders of all nations. The Nations left angered.

Events.headline: World Reccord Iceberg!
Events.desc: The Water Tribe released a monstorous iceberg into the sea, causing the world to cool.

Events.headline: Local Earth Benders widen all rivers towards Full Moon Bay.

Events.headline: Make it Rain!

Events.desc: Electric benders fill the grid, all combustion generators are shut off.

Events.headline: Tornado?! Blame the Leader!
Events.desc: The capital was hit with a tornado and the citizens blame you.

Events.desc: The Sky bison begin reproducing, causing a larger methane emission.

Events.headline: Trade Poultry and Livestock
Events.desc: Fire Nations trading livestock bred with other nations. The list includes and is limited to: Dragon Moose, Turtle Duck and Hippo Cow

Events.desc: Fire Nations starts new trade program, trading precious metals with Earth Kingdom and Water Tribe

Events.desc: Fire Lord Elizablaze and Fire Prime Minister Truferno announce additional federal funding to factories involved with manafacturing glass

Events.headline: Fire Nation starts new trade deal with Earth Kingdom

Events.headline: Uproar in the Fire Nation, as Truferno raises taxes
Events.desc: Truferno intorduces carbon tax to reduce green house gas emissions

Events.headline: Fire Nation starts working on urbanization project
Events.desc: The Fire Nation government launches is it's new 5 year urbanization project, brought about by the rapidly rising population

Events.headline: Inventor from the Fire Nations builds the first automobile engine that runs on fuel
Events.desc: Fire Nation sactioned project to make a more powerful engine than the steam engine comes to fruitition

Events.headline: Coal Mine collapses, 100 miners trapped, 20 dead and counting.
Events.desc: Fire Lord and Prime Minister pool all their resources to save the lives of trapped Coal Miners

Events.headline: Fire Nation trades machines and engines that can be used by non benders

Events.headline: Non bender protest turns violent after police intervention
Events.desc: Riot Control squad was deployed in order to intimidate protesters. Protest turns violent
